info.s1products.server

クラス ServerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.s1products.server.ServerBase

  • public abstract class ServerBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provided message routing core functions. To implement own message routing server, extend this abstract class.

    [ Feature list ]

    • Create message routers
    • Start message routers
    • Stop message routers

    作成者:
    Shuichi Miura
    関連項目:
    Router, RequestPacketRouter, NotificationPacketRouter

    • コンストラクタの概要

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      ServerBase() 

    • メソッドの概要

      メソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      protected abstract void cleanupServer()
      This method called on stopServer method.
      protected abstract java.util.List<DeviceMessageReceiver> createDeviceMessageReceiverList()
      Create device message receiver list objects on this method.
      protected abstract java.util.List<DeviceMessageSender> createDeviceMessageSenderList()
      Create device message sender list objects on this method.
      protected abstract java.util.List<NotificationPlan> createNotificationPlanList()
      Create notification plan list objects on this method.
      protected abstract java.util.List<RequestConverter> createRequestConverterList()
      Create request converter list objects on this method.
      protected abstract java.util.List<RequestHandler> createRequestHandlerList()
      Create request handler list objects on this method.
      boolean isWorking()
      Determine whether this server state is working or stopped
      protected abstract void onStartNotificationRouter(NotificationPacketRouter router)
      This method called on startServer method and start notification router.
      protected abstract void onStartRequestRouter(RequestPacketRouter router)
      This method called on startServer method and start request router.
      protected abstract void prepareServer()
      This method called on startServer method.
      boolean startServer()
      Start request and notification routers.
      void stopServer()
      Stop request and notification routers.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • ServerBase

        public ServerBase()

    • メソッドの詳細

      • prepareServer

        protected abstract void prepareServer()
        This method called on startServer method. If call startServer method then this method will be called before start routers.

      • onStartRequestRouter

        protected abstract void onStartRequestRouter(RequestPacketRouter router)
        This method called on startServer method and start request router. If you want to initialize some objects, implement them on this method.
        パラメータ:
        router - Start target request router

      • onStartNotificationRouter

        protected abstract void onStartNotificationRouter(NotificationPacketRouter router)
        This method called on startServer method and start notification router. If you want to initialize some objects, implement them on this method.
        パラメータ:
        router - Start target request router

      • createRequestConverterList

        protected abstract java.util.List<RequestConverter> createRequestConverterList()
        Create request converter list objects on this method. This method called on startServer method and start request router.
        戻り値:
        Converter list

      • createDeviceMessageSenderList

        protected abstract java.util.List<DeviceMessageSender> createDeviceMessageSenderList()
        Create device message sender list objects on this method. This method called on startServer method and start request router.
        戻り値:
        Device message sender list

      • createRequestHandlerList

        protected abstract java.util.List<RequestHandler> createRequestHandlerList()
        Create request handler list objects on this method. This method called on startServer method and start request router.
        戻り値:
        Reuqest handler list

      • createNotificationPlanList

        protected abstract java.util.List<NotificationPlan> createNotificationPlanList()
        Create notification plan list objects on this method. This method called on startServer method and start notification router.
        戻り値:
        Notification plan list

      • createDeviceMessageReceiverList

        protected abstract java.util.List<DeviceMessageReceiver> createDeviceMessageReceiverList()
        Create device message receiver list objects on this method. This method called on startServer method and start notification router.
        戻り値:
        Device message receiver list

      • cleanupServer

        protected abstract void cleanupServer()
        This method called on stopServer method. If call stopServer method then this method will be called after stop routers.

      • isWorking

        public boolean isWorking()
        Determine whether this server state is working or stopped
        戻り値:
        True: working, False: stopped

      • startServer

        public boolean startServer()
        Start request and notification routers.
        戻り値:
        True: Working, False: Stopped

      • stopServer

        public void stopServer()
        Stop request and notification routers.
